New Records: Sri Lanka achieved the highest chase in Asia Cup history by scoring 184/8.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 2 wickets to qualify for the Super 4.
Mosaddek Hossain powered Bangladesh to 183/7 after 20 overs.
Ebadot Hossain's twin strikes put Bangladesh in command.
Shakib Al Hasan's direct hit to dismiss Chamika Karunaratne.
Taskin Ahmed took a crucial wicket of Wanindu Hasaranga.
Dasun Shanaka's boundary and subsequent dismissal by Mosaddek Hossain.
Pre-Game Insights: Shakib Al Hasan mentioned at the toss that they wanted to field first and made three changes to their team.
Dasun Shanaka stated at the toss that Sri Lanka opted to bowl first on a used wicket and focused on their batting.
